    public static enum BleSetupHelper.Permission
extends java.lang.Enum<BleSetupHelper.Permission>
    Enumerates the various permissions that we will try to enable (if needed)

    • Enum Constant Detail

      • ANDROID_12_BLUETOOTH

        public static final BleSetupHelper.Permission ANDROID_12_BLUETOOTH
        Android 12+ permission, used for being able to scan for BLE devices. Note that SweetBlue also requests Manifest.permission.BLUETOOTH_CONNECT in addition to Manifest.permission.BLUETOOTH_SCAN, as it is needed to process the scan results. This will also request Manifest.permission.BLUETOOTH_ADVERTISE, if BleManagerConfig.requestAdvertisePermission is set to true. If you want to request these permissions separately, then do not use this class to handle requesting permissions. See for more details on permission handling for Android 12+

      • BLUETOOTH

        public static final BleSetupHelper.Permission BLUETOOTH
        The Bluetooth permission... This is always required in order to be able to do just about anything.

      • LOCATION_PERMISSION

        public static final BleSetupHelper.Permission LOCATION_PERMISSION
        Used when checking and requesting location permissions from the user. This is not required unless the version is at least Build.VERSION_CODES.M.

      • LOCATION_SERVICES

        public static final BleSetupHelper.Permission LOCATION_SERVICES
        Used when checking if the device needs Location services turned on and enabling Location services if they are disabled. This step isn't necessarily needed for overall Bluetooth scanning. It is only needed for Bluetooth Low Energy scanning in Build.VERSION_CODES.M; otherwise, SweetBlue will default to classic scanning.

      • CUSTOM

        public static final BleSetupHelper.Permission CUSTOM
        Custom permission, this has no built in implementation. If you want to use the enabler to handle enabling of other permissions, you can override some functionality and use this enum value to indicate other permissions. See BleSetupHelper.PermissionInstance
